# 𒉠 MURUB4 𒀊 AB gunu 𒆦

𒉠 ᶜURUB₄ guerreᵇ

𒉠 ᶜURUB₄ •qarbal #qabal / #qablu ( 𒋡 𒁄 𒋙 ) qabli ( 𒉠 , 𒃮 𒇷 ) ; qablu ( 𒃮 𒇻 ) Kabale guerre

𒉠 ᶜURUB₄ •qarbal corebaˡ

𒉠 saĝ5 ≈ 𒂟 sig₅ siege

𒉠 saĝ5 search, sort 𒉠 NISAG #nasāqu 𒉠 ≈ 𒍠 ZAG ≈ 𒊕 saĝ

𒉠 ≈ 𒌙 MURₓ ≈ 𒄯 MUR ≈ 𒈬 MU ≈ 𒆦𒌓 murx ≈ 𒆦𒃰 ≈ 𒉠

𒉠 ≈ 𓈗 in 𒉠 𒌓𒁴 MURUB₄ tam-tim "middle of the sea"

𒋢𒂡𒂡 /šeršer/ שַׁרְשְׁרָה šaršərā “chains” @ Kerker
